transcription.text: Apo, Mr. John Lim, Bernardo Jr.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Apo, good afternoon sir. This is Christine from EMG Collections.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Ang bihap of Maya Bank over the recorded line. For account security po, yung last four mobile number on yung Maya Credit, 1657.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Okay, confirm po. So, pag-checking on your account, your AT is passed. Yung amounting po, 7,482.01 centavos. Nakapag-settle lang po ng payment, sir.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Ano po yung reason para bakit hindi pa po nakapag-settle ng payment?
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Oh, sorry to serve you po.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Apo, nakita ko naman, sir, na nasa hospital po kayo. Tama po ba?
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Okay po. At the same time. Okay po. So, sige sir, pasensya na po kung natatawagan at the same time po. If ever naman po kindly pasen na lamang po sa email, sa info at emgcollect.ph regarding po on your, kung baga kung anong nangyari po talaga. And then, in-noted ko naman po, sir. Hello po. Apo, salamat sir sa pagsasagot sa tawag po. Thank you and have a nice day po. Pagaling po.
transcription.speaker: spk2

translation.tagalog: Apo, Mr. John Lim, Bernardo Jr.
Apo, good afternoon sir. This is Christine from EMG Collections.
translation.english: Hello, this is Christine from the M.E.C.

translation.tagalog: Ang bihap of Maya Bank over the recorded line. For account security po, yung last four mobile number on yung Maya Credit, 1657.
translation.english: The last four digits of the mobile number on the account security, 1657.

translation.tagalog: Okay, confirm po. So, pag-checking on your account, your AT is passed. Yung amounting po, 7,482.01 centavos. Nakapag-settle lang po ng payment, sir.
translation.english: Okay, confirm. So, checking on your account, your AT is passed. That's the amount, 7,482.01 centavos. Just settled the payment, sir.

translation.tagalog: Ano po yung reason para bakit hindi pa po nakapag-settle ng payment?
translation.english: What is the reason why the payment has not been settled yet?

translation.tagalog: Oh, sorry to serve you po.
Apo, nakita ko naman, sir, na nasa hospital po kayo. Tama po ba?
translation.english: Grandpa, I saw you, sir, in the hospital.

translation.tagalog: Okay po. At the same time. Okay po. So, sige sir, pasensya na po kung natatawagan at the same time po. If ever naman po kindly pasen na lamang po sa email, sa info at emgcollect.ph regarding po on your, kung baga kung anong nangyari po talaga. And then, in-noted ko naman po, sir. Hello po. Apo, salamat sir sa pagsasagot sa tawag po. Thank you and have a nice day po. Pagaling po.
translation.english: I'm sorry, but I'm going to have to ask you to leave a message at the end of the email, and if you're still not sure what you're looking for, please email me at info.emgcollect.ph regarding your request, and then I'll let you know what's really going on.
